pos2-set: Seconds position was set at {0}:{1}:{2} (Price: {M}{3}) Use "/land buy" to confirm buying.
must-one-world: &4You must set position in same world.
land-overlap: &4You are trying to overlap with land #{0} which {1} owns.
max-land-count: &4You have reached max count ({0}) of land.
no-money: &4You don't have enough money to buy land.
invalid-option: Invalid option. Options: &2pvp, pickup, access, hide
modify-forbidden: &4#{0}: Here is {1}'s land. You cannot modify here.
modify-whiteland: &4You have to buy here to modify here.
access-forbidden: &4#{0}: Here is {1}'s land. You cannot access here.
pickup-forbidden: &4#{0}: Here is {1}'s land. You cannot pickup item from here.
move-forbidden: &4#{0}: You cannot move to the land. The owner prohibited the access of the land.
